Johns Hopkins Community Physicians - Orthopaedic & Spine Surgery

6420 Rockledge Drive
Suite 2200 - Orthopaedic and Spine Surgery
Bethesda, MD 20817

Phone & Fax:
301-530-3220 or 240-762-5100: Orthopaedic and Spine Surgery
410-367-2237: Fax

Maps and directions

Practice Hours:

Monday-Friday: 8 a.m. to 4:30 p.m.

Available Services:

Orthopaedic Surgery
